summary.span: Содержит классы, предназначенные для поддержки взаимодействия элементов управления Windows Forms и WPF.

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Пространство имен содержит классы, обеспечивающие взаимодействие [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] между технологиями [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] и. The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies. При использовании классов можно размещать [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] элементы управления на страницах и [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] элементы в [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]приложениях на основе.When you use classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications. Двумя ключевыми классами, реализующими возможности взаимодействия , являются и.The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . Используемый класс зависит от реализации элемента управления:Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - Используйте класс , если необходимо [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] использовать элемент управления на [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] странице.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page. - Используйте класс , если необходимо [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] использовать элемент в [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]приложении на основе.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
